title: Many classic moments
creator_credit: Da Capo Films, James Sherman and Gary Capo
brief_description: ‘Many Classic Moments’ explores the emotional surfing experience of some of the world’s best surfing talent, including Larry Bertleman, Michael Ho, Mark Liddell, Buttons Kaluhiokalani, James Jones and Dane Kealoha. The experiences are linked by their communication of the emotions that make up the thrill of surfing. The tape includes ‘Moments of fear’, ‘Moments of searching and finding’, ‘The Ultimate moment’, as well as a Surf Wars Cartoon.
